apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji depicts two men sharing a tender kiss, rendered with Apple's signature soft, rounded edges and realistic lighting.  The medium skin tone of one man and the medium-dark skin tone of the other are presented with subtle gradients, conveying warmth and intimacy. This emoji, with its smooth 3D shading, beautifully symbolizes romantic love, affection, and close relationships between two men in digital conversations on Apple devices.
